sentence: Jeff Singer: Cawthorn's main opponent right now looks like state Senator Chuck Edwards, who has the endorsement of Senator Thom Tillis.
title: The Downballot: Big, big May primary preview (transcript)

sentence: Jeff Singer: Cawthorn's main opponent right now looks like state Senator Chuck Edwards, who has the endorsement of Senator Thom Tillis.

sentence: Cawthorn's two main opponents are state Sen. Chuck Edwards (R), considered the so-called establishment pick, and Michele Woodhouse, a former GOP district chair.
author: Tal Axelrod
title: Mounting scandals fuel uncertainty over Cawthorn's reelection
